head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths SCHORK, KURT ERICH

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths SCHORK, KURT ERICH

block.p: SCHORK-Kurt Erich. A dedicated Reuters correspondent killed May 24, 2000 in Sierra Leona. Mourned by family, friends and colleagues around the world. A public memorial service will be held at 6 pm, Thursday, June 1 at the National Building Museum, Washington, DC (entrance on G St between 4th & 5th St NW). Donations may be sent to the Kurt Schork Memorial Fund, C/O Reuters, 1333 H Street NW, Washington, D.C. 20005.

SCHORK-Kurt Erich. A dedicated Reuters correspondent killed May 24, 2000 in Sierra Leona. Mourned by family, friends and colleagues around the world. A public memorial service will be held at 6 pm, Thursday, June 1 at the National Building Museum, Washington, DC (entrance on G St between 4th & 5th St NW). Donations may be sent to the Kurt Schork Memorial Fund, C/O Reuters, 1333 H Street NW, Washington, D.C. 20005.
